Name: Lois D. Tall
Description:
So she does have a voice after all!

The icon that I've cherished since I was a kid, brought to life with the help of the website 15 AI! I would be super critical about how the idol would sound, but I think this hits the bill just fine!

Instead of a monotone robot, this perfectly sane waifu will be there every step of the way! Totally on your side! All that good, fluffy stuff!
